title: 'What a joke': Gavin Newsom's team slams Ron DeSantis' debate proposal
description: It looks like the possibility of a debate between California's Gavin Newsom and Florida's Ron DeSantis may still be a ways off.

title: Teen suspect arrested in fatal stabbing of Brooklyn gay man is charged with hate crime
description: The 17-year-old suspect arrested in connection with the fatal stabbing of a 28-year-old gay man at a Brooklyn gas station was charged with murder as a hate crime, officials said Saturday.

title: Trial scheduled in lawsuit brought by former Donda Academy teachers who sued Ye for wrongful termination
description: A lawsuit involving two former Donda Academy teachers who sued Ye for what they said was wrongful termination from his now-shuttered private Christian school is scheduled for an April 2025 trial.

title: Ukrainian drones hit sanctioned Russian tanker in second sea attack in a day
description: A Russian tanker under U.S. sanctions was hit by Ukrainian drone near a strategic bridge in the Kerch Strait that links Russia to the annexed Crimean peninsula, Kremlin officials said Saturday.

title: 33 officer arrests in 3 years: Sheriff asks 'What are we doing wrong?'
description: The sheriff of Richmond County, Georgia, is trying to figure out why there have been so many officers charged with crimes — and how to curb the misconduct.

title: Don't rub castor oil in your eyes, doctors say, no matter what they do on social media
description: Is it OK to put castor oil in your eyes? TikTok videos promote using castor oil for vision problems, but eye doctors say there's little evidence benefits outweigh risks.

title: As student loan payments loom, borrowers weigh deferrals, ‘debt strikes’ and Deuteronomy
description: Since the Supreme Court killed Biden's debt forgiveness plan, social media users have been trading sympathy, support and advice — some of which personal finance experts warn against.

title: Over 1,300 migrants cross the border into Arizona daily, despite record heat
description: While Texas Gov. Greg Abbott places buoys in the Rio Grande to make it harder for migrants to cross into his state, a growing number of migrants have braved record-breaking heat and dangerous terrain to cross into Arizona.

title: Green backlash? U.K.’s leader fuels battle over driving — which could signal a coming climate fight
description: LONDON — Posing in a car once owned by conservative icon Margaret Thatcher, British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak explained why he was launching a media blitz to burnish his own credentials as a champion of the average voter against what he considers state overreach in the name of the environment.

title: Special counsel cites threatening Trump post in request for protective order in election case
description: Prosecutors said Trump’s use of evidence obtained in discovery “could have a harmful chilling effect on witnesses or adversely affect the fair administration of justice in this case."

title: Who is Kai Cenat, the Twitch streamer who sparked pandemonium in New York City with a gaming giveaway?
description: Twitch streamer Kai Cenat hosted a game console giveaway Friday afternoon in New York City’s Union Square Park.

title: Trump trial date emerges as flashpoint ahead of next hearing in election case
description: Judge Tanya Chutkan, who is overseeing Donald Trump’s election obstruction case, is expected to set a start date for the trial at an Aug. 28 hearing.

title: Wells Fargo customers scramble after deposits disappear from their accounts
description: Amber Matherly had planned to move into her new apartment Thursday.

title: FDA approves first pill for postpartum depression
description: The FDA has approved the first-ever pill for postpartum depression. The medication could also eventually get approved for clinical depression.

title: How a California vote on self-driving taxis could alter the future of AI
description: A CA state board is set to vote on whether to allow tech companies Waymo and Cruise to launch a massive expansion of driverless taxi fleets in San Francisco.
